participant_1.name: Mike Johnson
participant_1.personality: Mike is a dedicated coach and a family man who enjoys relaxing with a glass of wine after a long day. He has a nurturing side, especially towards his sons.
participant_1.background: i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Emma Smith
participant_2.personality: Emma is a creative individual with a passion for music. She is friendly and enjoys sharing her experiences with her pets.
participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.
